definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
unfamiliar at first but you get used to it/strangers are first meeting, but soon friends/an acquired taste
pinyin: yi1 ci4 sheng1 , liang3 ci4 shu2

definition: to take sth as a lesson for next time (idiom)/once bitten, twice shy
pinyin: shang4 yi1 ci4 dang4 , xue2 yi1 ci4 guai1

definition: to take sth as a lesson for next time (idiom)/once bitten, twice shy
pinyin: shang4 yi1 ci4 dang4 , xue2 yi1 ci4 guai1

definition: many times/on more than one occasion

sentences.english: Once more, Cinderella's fairy godmother reminded her to be home by midnight.
sentences.chinese: 仙女教母再一次提醒辛德瑞拉要在午夜前到家。

sentences.english: YOLO is an acronym for "you only live once".
sentences.chinese: YOLO是“你只活一次”的英文首字母缩写。

sentences.english: Again, they abstained from replying to my question.
sentences.chinese: 再一次，他们避开了我的问题。

sentences.english: Twelve months' non-stop football is doing me well. I feel that I am still growing in form.
sentences.chinese: 这是我这几年来第一次有这样的感受。

sentences.english: Last fall, I had my first sleepover.
sentences.chinese: 去年秋天，我有了第一次外宿。

sentences.english: He tried to tick me off, once; and I lost my temper.
sentences.chinese: 有一次他想叱责我，我发了脾气。

sentences.english: The text is a sane conversation with millions of participants.
sentences.chinese: 文本是一次与无数参与者的理智交谈。

sentences.english: Rooney, in turn, has created only one for Berbatov.
sentences.chinese: 反过来，鲁尼仅仅助攻贝尔巴托夫一次。
更换的系统模块又一次重新安装。

sentences.english: A transferee who is dissatisfied with such an order may apply for review not more than once.
sentences.chinese: 受让人对裁定不服的，可以申请复议一次。

sentences.english: If I have enought money, I will make a journey around the world.
sentences.chinese: 如果我有足够的资金，我将完成一次环球旅行。

sentences.english: Don’t worry about mother, I’ll cover for you this time.
sentences.chinese: 别担心妈妈那边，这一次我会为你掩护的。

sentences.english: Once he took us to be photographed with him in some big English photographic studio.
sentences.chinese: 有一次，他带我们到一个很大的英国照相馆里去照相。

sentences.english: Truth? A pebble of quartz? For once, then, something.
sentences.chinese: 真相？一块石英？只一次，便成永远。

sentences.english: Next time have her telephone you.
sentences.chinese: 下一次叫她给你打磙电话。

sentences.english: When was your wife's last menstrual period?
sentences.chinese: 你妻子上一次例假是在什么时候？

definition: next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
number of times/frequency/order number (in a series)/power (math.)/degree of a polynomial (math.)
one week/all the way around/a whole cycle
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
